          <title>
            <string language="en">Sizes of the Sun and a red giant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größen der Sonne und des roten Riesen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tailles du soleil et d'un géant rouge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tamanhos do sol e de um gigante vermelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati del sole e di un gigante rosso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγέθη του ήλιου και ενός κόκκινου γίγαντα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tallas del sol y de un gigante rojo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the relative sizes of the Sun as a main sequence star and as a red giant.</string>
          </description>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die relativen Größen
der Sonne als Hauptreihenfolge Stern und als roter Riese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare les tailles relatives 
du soleil pendant qu'un ordre principal tiennent le premier rôle et comme 
géant rouge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara os tamanhos relativos 
do sol como uma estrela principal da seqüência e como um gigante 
vermelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta i formati relativi
del sole come stella principale di sequenza e come gigante rosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τα σχετικά μεγέθη του 
ήλιου ως βασικό αστέρι ακολουθίας και ως κόκκινο γίγαντα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara las tallas relativas 
del sol como estrella principal de la secuencia y como gigante rojo.</string>
